item.title: Bangalore to Bheemeshwari Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Bheemeshwari can be a peaceful and adventurous experience, as you'll get to explore the serene nature, engage in activities like fishing and river rafting and enjoy the tranquility of this riverside destination in Karnataka. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Ramanagara -> Channapatna -> Halagur -> Channapatna -> Rama
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
